data.title: Marcel van Eeden on LinkedIn: Marcel van Eeden
data.meta_description:
New book coming up
The artist book Marcel van Eeden – 1898 is being published to coincide with the Hans-Thoma Prize 2023. The prize-winner, Marcel van Eeden (*…
data.text: Next week in Paris: Photobook on Hans Thoma, Julius Langbehn and anti-Semitism in the 19th century and, in fact, again today. Fotobuch über Hans Thoma, Julius Langbehn und den Antisemitismus im 19. Jahrhundert und eigentlich auch heute wieder. Fotoboek over Hans Thoma, Julius Langbehn en het anti-semitisme in de 19e eeuw en eigenlijk dus ook nu weer. Repost Kerber Verlag: We are getting ready for Paris! Paris Photo is taking place from November 9 to 12 and we would like to invite you to visit us at our booth SE 29. We will present our new photo books and have invited numerous photographers to sign their books. We are very much looking forward to seeing you! . Book Signings Thursday, 9 Nov 2023 2 pm Martina Sauter 3 pm Frizzi Krella 3 pm Sylvie Leblanc 4 pm John Peter Askew 4 pm Mark Pinder 5 pm René Riis . Friday, 10 Nov 2023 2 pm Willi Filz 3 pm Doug Fogelson 4 pm Andréas Lang 4 pm Marcel van Eeden 5 pm Winfried Muthesius 5 pm Gudrun Scholz . Saturday, 11 Nov 2023 2 pm Rainer Zerback 2 pm Pascal Haas 3 pm Marius Svaleng Andresen 3 pm Piet Niemann 4 pm Corina Gertz 4 pm Eric Mistler 5 pm The Opéra (editor Matthias Straub and artists Laurent Fiorentino, Constanza Pérez and Rémi Rebillard) . . @parisphotofair #KerberVerlag #ParisPhoto #ParisPhoto2023 #ParisPhotoFair #Photobooks #BookSignings
